body: 我也在用echarts 做知识图谱的二次开发，遇到很多问题。比如两点将多条线的问题无法用echarts实现，希望能与你交流经验。
@JeffreyRoosendaal Interested in this as well, it makes no sense to display the tooltip outside of the window.

Would be a nice feature. It's possible to use percentages. We use that for label, the disadvantage is that the font family will be reset to default one as the generated this way text styles look like this:
```style="font: 80% px sans-serif;"```

One trick here would be add your desired font named as `px` :)

> 能否列举一个你觉得必须要自己定义刻度值的例子？谢谢

例子比如绘制泰勒曲线的时候，需要的时X轴能够自定义显示某些数字。

https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-examples/issues/6

You can load it in pieces.
https://www.echartsjs.com/api.html#echartsInstance.appendData

It does show an exception.
you can set `axisTick.show` and `splitLine.show` to `false`
Can you give an example?https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html
Please provide links

https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xGWbfRNIcn&v=1
What file is missing? please provide detailed message.
@yizhengfeng-jj, please provide the link of the demo.
you can see this [example](https://www.echartsjs.com/examples/editor.html?c=graphgl-npm-dep&gl=1&theme=dark).
see this [doc](https://www.echartsjs.com/option.html#series-tree.symbol)
There is no better way at the moment.
You should not need to quote other files anymore, and I don't understand what you mean.
please provide an detailed message, such as an demo.
sorry, I don't understand you, please provide an detailed message.

It is probably beyond the meaning of `lineStyle`.
But, what scenario do you use lineStyle in?

[custom series](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/tutorial.html#Custom%20Series) might help.
There is no configuration item to do this directly, you can try to implement legend icon with rich text.

Thanks Clem. 
I'll dive into it and Apache Software Foundation related documents to make a further decision.

> What file is missing? please provide detailed message.
missing file: zrender/lib/graphic/helper/subPixelOptimize.js
有开发看到这个issue了吗？ 不管你解决不解决，请先给个答复，谢谢。

![u8v 1w qzhxyn 2f99 y](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26119862/51449457-14d74500-1d67-11e9-839d-e80a9f70df51.png)

![0xo urq5y3 _ 6 g09aa4 x](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26119862/51449530-6c75b080-1d67-11e9-8b92-f24a33360a2b.png)

请问下这又是啥问题？
The textures in globe demo are all from https://visibleearth.nasa.gov/view_cat.php?categoryID=1484

@deqingli 在实际使用Echarts过程中，往往需要在图例中加入series.data下的数据。当前echarts版本中legend.formatter作为回调函数使用时，里面的params只有name。因此我需要的是能够在这个params中获取到series.data中的数据。
举一个简单的例子，也是我最近碰到的需求，需要显示这样的图例

- 北京 10个(20%)
- 上海 15个(30%)
- 广州 15个 (30%)

我目前的做法只能是获取到params参数中的name，然后与原数组做匹配循环以实现需求。

> The textures in globe demo are all from https://visibleearth.nasa.gov/view_cat.php?categoryID=1484

the image i am looking for is https://echarts.baidu.com/documents/asset/gl/img/globe-shading-color.png
持续关注中。

> 后续会考虑加上，谢谢反馈

希望能加上这个功能, 谢谢
It's rendered by echarts
i meet same problem, and solved by check `xAxis` and `yAxis` has the same `gridIndex` and `position` config

i understand the whole picture is rendered by echarts.what i searching for is the picture is use for the attribute **"baseTexture"**. i don't need a real world textures, i prefer a framed and color filled one as the pic i mentioned above.
and can we discuss this use our native language if it possible?
公司的系统在内网使用，需要在内网中使用

> 由A节点指向B节点的多条边？如何实现？

A节点指向B节点，B节点指向A节点，这种情况只有一条边的两个箭头，想用双向边来实现
找到方法了吗？
As Apache has its own COC Web page, it may not be a good idea to make a copy here. So I added a link in the readme.

> http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xR9ug3y7FY&v=2

你这个有个bug 当触发了dataZoom(放大)时 可以发现x轴的分类会发生变化，不是一年（四个季度）对应一个分类。这么做是错误的

> > tooltip不支持canvas里的tooltip，你可以吧你init对象变成div。但根据你的需求我觉得你直接用scatter3d就好，在option里设置tooltip就好了
> 
> baseTexture只能是图片或者Canvas对象，init变成div不可能啊
解决了吗
Any update on this issue? :-)
<https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xR9ug3y7FY&v=3>
@deqingli Probably we should find a way to support collapse/expand and plain click both.
Try to remove the option `series[i].stack`, is it your expectation?
It depends on BaiduMap. I have no idea about it, but could you find more info from the doc of BaiduMap?
And the `visualMap.data` is also not able to support the original data, but only support `[0, 1, 2, ...]`

Have you set something about:
```html
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, ..."/>
```

Do not support it until necessary.
In most cases, it is not necessary to render a pie chart in 3D style.

Not supported in funnel chart yet.

But a workaround can be made by <https://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#graphic>
Probably <https://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-custom.type> can be used in this case.
Sounds great, thanks
Probably <https://www.echartsjs.com/option-gl.html#series-surface.type> can meet your requirement.

`log(0)` is `-Infinity`. So after removing `0` it will be OK.
But it is needed to be think whether to trade `0` as an empty data.
Only support that: positive values stack with positive values, negative values stack with negative values.
It has been fixed and will be released this week.

has been updated just now.

如果新数据超出了现在的轴的话, 貌似还需要调用一次 myChart.resize()
it seems like you need to call myChart.resize() if the new data is out of current x axis range
Merged. Thanks!

> What file is missing? please provide detailed message.

missingInfo:
missing file: zrender/lib/graphic/helper/subPixelOptimize.js

How is the problem solved?

> It has been fixed and will be released this week.

thank you，waiting the new version。

Yes,removing `0` it will be OK.
Based the series type is 'bar', normally, data `0` should be accepted.  and the bar length should be zero.
As you said, if Echarts trade `0` as an empty data when Y-axis type is 'log' should be a good practices.
@100pah  并不是我想要的效果, 我要的是截断后, 点是不分离的, 相连的,
你可以看看 http://www.sse.com.cn/market/price/trends/  上证指数 , 我现在就是想做这个效果,
This needs to be fixed as soon as possible, in order to maintain the integrity of what makes eCharts the best alternative for any sort of graphing library.
https://echarts.baidu.com/tutorial.html#%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%20ECharts%20GL%20%E5%AE%9E%E7%8E%B0%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%89%E7%BB%B4%E5%8F%AF%E8%A7%86%E5%8C%96
How can I display a vertical line from the top to the bottom of the chart? Can I use any keyword for it? I've seen that if values are out of the displayed range, the line is simply not displayed.

Label Name for markArea is overlapping.
I was able to reproduce the same issue with multiple markAreas. See image below:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6745984/51624468-2a9d6380-1f3b-11e9-8d8d-cbf83add752d.png)


### **Expected behaviour:**

Do not show markArea's labels for the hidden areas.

Thanks @ClemMakesApps .
The SVG path set to <https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#series-line.symbol> is not really converted to a SVG element, but is parsed to generate corresponding zrender graphic elements and then rendered in canvas or SVG. The performance issue has been considered inside this procedure.

The tutorials are not all translated into English, and the related one for accessibility is missing for English. I will fix this later.
For the time being, you may refer to [aria in option document](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#aria).
